00034 RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::xmlServerConf(){
00035   LOGI("xmlServerConf created");
00036 
00037   correctlyLoaded=false;
00038 
00039   // Getting the absolute filename
00040   RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI gu;
00041   filename=gu.getUserDirFile("server.xml");
00042 
00044   doc=new TiXmlDocument( this->filename.c_str() );
00045   if (doc){
00046     bool ret=doc->LoadFile();
00047     if (ret){
00048       root =doc->RootElement();
00049       if (root){
00050         correctlyLoaded=true;
00051         LOGI("Server configuration file correctly loaded");
00052       }
00053       else{
00054         LOGW("Cannot get a valid root element");
00055         LOGCATS(" Error was :");
00056         LOGCATS(doc->ErrorDesc());
00057         LOGCAT();
00058       }
00059     }
00060     else{
00061       LOGW("Cannot load the xml document");
00062       LOGCATS(" Error was :");
00063       LOGCATS(doc->ErrorDesc());
00064       LOGCAT();
00065     }
00066   }
00067   else{
00068     LOGW("Cannot create a document from the given xml file");
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00075 RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::~xmlServerConf(){
00076   delete doc;
00077   doc=NULL;
00078   root=NULL;
00079 }

00090 bool RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::load(ServerConfiguration* sc){
00091   LOGI("Getting saved server configuration :");
00092 
00093   LOGCATS("  name : '");
00094   LOGCATS( getServerName() );
00095   LOGCATS("'");
00096   LOGCAT();
00097 
00098   LOGCATS("  desc : '");
00099   LOGCATS( getServerDesc() );
00100   LOGCATS("'");
00101   LOGCAT();
00102 
00103   LOGCATS("  technote : '");
00104   LOGCATS( getTechNote() );
00105   LOGCATS("'");
00106   LOGCAT();
00107 
00108   LOGCATS("  Playmode : '");
00109   LOGCATB( getPlayMode() );
00110   LOGCATS("'");
00111   LOGCAT();
00112 
00113   LOGCATS("  Editmode : '");
00114   LOGCATB( getEditMode() );
00115   LOGCATS("'");
00116   LOGCAT();
00117 
00118   LOGCATS("  Floodmode : '");
00119   LOGCATB( getFloodMode() );
00120   LOGCATS("'");
00121   LOGCAT();
00122 
00123   LOGCATS("  Port : '");
00124   LOGCATI( getPort() );
00125   LOGCATS("'");
00126   LOGCAT();
00127 
00128   LOGCATS("  MaxClient : '");
00129   LOGCATI( getMaxClient() );
00130   LOGCATS("'");
00131   LOGCAT();
00132 
00133   sc->setName(getServerName());
00134   sc->setDesc(getServerDesc());
00135   sc->setTechNote(getTechNote());
00136   sc->setPlayMode(getPlayMode());
00137   sc->setEditMode(getEditMode());
00138   sc->setFloodMode(getFloodMode());
00139   sc->setPort(getPort());
00140   sc->setMaxClient(getMaxClient());
00141   sc->setIpAdress(getIpAdress());
00142 }

00150 const char* RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::getServerName(){
00151   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Name" );
00152   if (childNode){
00153     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00154     if (lu){
00155       return lu->GetText();
00156     }
00157     else{
00158       return "";
00159     }
00160   }
00161   else{
00162     return "";
00163   }
00164 }
00165

00173   if (childNode){
00174     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00175     if (lu){
00176       return lu->GetText();
00177     }
00178     else{
00179       return "";
00180     }
00181   }
00182   else{
00183     return "";
00184   }
00185 }

00192 const char* RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::getTechNote(){
00193   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "TechnicalNote" );
00194   if (childNode){
00195     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00196     // To prevent an empty TechnicalNote error
00197     if (lu->FirstChild()==NULL){
00198       return "";
00199     }
00200     if (lu){
00201       return lu->GetText();
00202     }
00203     else{
00204       return "";
00205     }
00206   }
00207   else{
00208     return "";
00209   }
00210 }
00211 
00219 bool RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::getMode(const char* mode){
00220   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Modes" );
00221   if (childNode){
00222     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00223     if (lu){
00224       const char* val= lu->Attribute(mode);
00225       bool b=StringConv::getSingleton().ctob(val);
00226       return b;
00227     }
00228     else{
00229       return false;
00230     }
00231   }
00232   else{
00233     return false;
00234   }
00235 }

00272 const char* RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::getOption(const char* opt){
00273   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Options" );
00274   if (childNode){
00275     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00276     if (lu){
00277       return lu->Attribute(opt);
00278     }
00279     else{
00280       return "";
00281     }
00282   }
00283   else{
00284     return "";
00285   }
00286 }

00315 bool RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::save(ServerConfiguration* sc){
00316   LOGI("Saving server configuration");
00317 
00318   setServerName(sc->getName());
00319   setDescription(sc->getDesc());
00320   setTechNote(sc->getTechNote());
00321   setServerMode(sc->getPlayMode(), sc->getEditMode(), sc->getFloodMode());
00322   setServerOption(sc->getIpAdress(), sc->getPort(), sc->getMaxClient());
00323 
00324   bool success=doc->SaveFile(this->filename.c_str());
00325   if (!success){
00326     LOGW("An error occurs during server configuration saved");
00327   }
00328   else{
00329     LOGI("Server configuration correctly saved");
00330   }
00331 }

00340 void RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::setServerName(const std::string& v){
00341   TiXmlText nameNode(v.c_str());
00342 
00343   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Name" );
00344   if (childNode){
00345     childNode->Clear();
00346     childNode->InsertEndChild(nameNode);
00347   }
00348 
00349 }

00364     childNode->InsertEndChild(nameNode);
00365   }
00366 
00367 }

00377   TiXmlText nameNode(v.c_str());

00379   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "TechnicalNote" );

00382     childNode->InsertEndChild(nameNode);

00394 void RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::
00395 setServerMode(bool play, bool edit, bool flood){
00396   const char* txtPlay=StringConv::getSingleton().btoc(play);
00397   const char* txtEdit=StringConv::getSingleton().btoc(edit);
00398   const char* txtFlood=StringConv::getSingleton().btoc(flood);
00399 
00400   TiXmlElement* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Modes" )->ToElement();
00401   if (childNode){
00402     childNode->Clear();
00403     childNode->SetAttribute("play", txtPlay);
00404     childNode->SetAttribute("editor", txtEdit);
00405     childNode->SetAttribute("flood", txtFlood);
00406   }
00407 }
00408 
00416 void RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf::
00417 setServerOption(const std::string& ip, int port, int maxClients){
00418   TiXmlElement* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Options" )->ToElement();
00419   if (childNode){
00420     childNode->Clear();
00421     childNode->SetAttribute("ip", ip.c_str());
00422     childNode->SetAttribute("port", port);
00423     childNode->SetAttribute("maxClient", maxClients);
00424  }
00425 
00426 }
